name: Kenneth SAXTON, Real party in interest and in behalf of Ens Legis: Kenneth Saxton, Petitioner v. JUDGES OF THE COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, PA, assigned to Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Re October Term 1980, Nos. 761, 764 & 765, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Saxton v. Judges of the Court of Common Pleas

parties: Kenneth SAXTON, Real party in interest and in behalf of Ens Legis: Kenneth Saxton, Petitioner v. JUDGES OF THE COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, PA, assigned to Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Re October Term 1980, Nos. 761, 764 & 765, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of October, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
102 A.3d 417
Kenneth SAXTON, Real party in interest and in behalf of Ens Legis: Kenneth Saxton, Petitioner v. JUDGES OF THE COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, PA, assigned to Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Re October Term 1980, Nos. 761, 764 & 765, Respondents.
No. 132 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 21, 2014.
